video_title: Agents Unleashed Podcast Ep. 10 - Why AI Agents Need Blockchains to Be Free ft. Trent McConaghy
description:
Welcome to Episode 10 of the Agents Unleashed Podcast ‚Äî the show that helps you find signal in the noisy world of agentic AI. 

Hosted by Thomas Maybrier (Digital Media Producer, Valory), this episode features a wide-ranging conversation with Trent McConaghy, co-founder of Ocean Protocol and the Artificial Superintelligence Alliance (ASI).

In This Episode:

Trent shares his journey, from early AI-for-chips design to launching Ocean Protocol, an early AI and crypto project. He explains his view on what a truly autonomous AI agent is, why they need sovereignty, and why blockchains are essential.

We also explore:

What makes an agent ‚Äúsovereign‚Äù, and why many agents today aren‚Äôt
How Ocean Protocol evolved
‚ÄúBitcoin as a life form‚Äù and what that could mean for AI
Reasons blockchains matter for AI agents
What‚Äôs next for AGI, ASI, and the future of brain-computer interfaces

Chapters
00:00 Introduction to Trent McConaghy and his background
06:13 The birth of Ocean Protocol
11:27 AI's evolution and its impact on daily life
17:22 Understanding autonomous agents
25:45 The future of AI and blockchain integration
26:13 The nature of sovereign AI agents
35:28 Blockchain's role in AI autonomy
36:27 The future of brain-computer interfaces
47:41 Sovereignty and control in the age of AGI
52:40 Conclusion and reflections on the conversation 

Agents Unleashed: Cannes ‚Äî June 30, 2025
The event is free, but space is limited.
RSVP here: https://lu.ma/tp6rhykz

Resources & Links:

Trent on X: @TrentMc0

Sponsored by Olas ‚Äî the best way to own and monetize your AI agents.
Learn more at https://www.olas.network
